description: A type of central venous catheter that is inserted in the periphery and advanced centrally to a large vein near the heart.

attributes.name: side
attributes.description: The side of the body where the peripherally inserted central catheter is placed.

values.name: Left upper extremity
values.description: PICC is placed in the left upper extremity.

values.name: Right upper extremity
values.description: PICC is placed in the right upper extremity.

values.name: Left lower extremity
values.description: PICC is placed in the left lower extremity.

values.name: Right lower extremity
values.description: PICC is placed in the right lower extremity.

attributes.name: distal_tip_location
attributes.description: The location of the distal tip of the PICC.

values.name: Subclavian vein
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is in the subclavian vein.

values.name: Brachiocephalic vein
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is in the brachiocephalic vein.

values.name: SVC
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is in the superior vena cava (SVC).

values.name: Superior cavoatrial junction
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is at the superior cavoatrial junction.

values.name: Azygous vein
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is in the azygous vein.

values.name: Inferior cavoatrial junction
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is at the inferior cavoatrial junction.

values.name: Internal jugular vein
values.description: The distal tip of the PICC is in the internal jugular vein.

attributes.name: appropriate_location
attributes.description: Whether the placement of the PICC is appropriate.

values.name: Yes
values.description: The placement of the PICC is appropriate.

values.name: No
values.description: The placement of the PICC is not appropriate.

attributes.name: change_from_prior
attributes.description: Any change from the previous findings of the PICC.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The PICC has been newly placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The PICC is unchanged from previous findings.

values.name: Retracted
values.description: The PICC has been retracted from its previous position.

values.name: Migrated
values.description: The PICC has migrated from its initial placement.
